subject: Re: [sugar] IconButton using bundle icon file
body:
Ok, thks, I'll wait then.tiboOn 4/18/07, Marco Pesenti Gritti <mpg@redhat.com> wrote:
On Wed, 2007-04-18 at 15:42 -0400, Thibaut Lamadon wrote:> Hi all,>> first, thks for your previous help.>> I'm switching the UI of the activity I'm working on from GTK to hippo
> widgets. With the IconButton, how do I use my own set of icons?> I'm guessing it's something like having the svg icons in a special> directory of the bundle, I just don't know which one.
>> Also, can someone give me the path to the source for the sugar> widgets? It's the best place to get their different properties, isn't> it? Or is there some kind of generated documentation?
>Please wait a bit on this... We are reconsidering the controlsimplementation. I'll post more informations about it in a few days.Marco
